items.title: Physicists just built a quantum lie detector. It works

• Results show quantum computers are not just bigger, but more authentically quantum

items.title: Scientists find brain circuit that traps alcohol users in the vicious cycle of addiction
bullets: • Scientists find brain circuit that traps alcohol users in the vicious cycle of addiction

• Researchers at Scripps Research have discovered that a tiny brain region called the paraventricular nucleus of the thalamus (PVT) becomes hyperactive when animals learn that alcohol eases the agony of withdrawal
• Findings could lead to treatments not only for substance use disorders but also for anxiety, trauma, and more
